content: in the next 3 row 5 ch1 single_crochet in the next 4 sts single_crochet 2 in sts turn 27 single_crochet the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn 18 single_crochet row 16 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across chain 9 and join with slip_stitch to first st of row turn row 6 ch1 single_crochet in the next 5 sts single_crochet 2 in 36 sts the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 sts leave remaining sts unworked turn 17 row 17 ch1 single_crochet in the next 11 sts single_crochet 2 in single_crochet the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn 39 single_crochet row 7 ch1 single_crochet in the next 6 sts single_crochet 2 in the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 sts row 18 33 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across turn 19 single_crochet join with slip_stitch and turn 39 single_crochet copyright tamara kelly 2012 all rights reserved this written pattern is for personal use by the purchaser only and not to be copied or distributed you are welcome to sell items made from this pattern row 34 ch1 single_crochet in the next 11 sts row 50 51 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join decrease 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn with slip_stitch and turn 16 single_crochet 36 single_crochet row 52 ch1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts row 35 36 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join decrease 4 times join with slip_stitch and turn with slip_stitch and turn 36 single_crochet 12 single_crochet row 37 ch1 single_crochet in the next 7 sts row 53 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join with decrease 4 times join with slip_stitch and turn slip_stitch and turn 12 single_crochet 32 single_crochet row 54 chain 1 pinch sides together row 38 39 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join vertically and single_crochet the seam closed with slip_stitch and turn 32 single_crochet working through both sides in each stitch 6 single_crochet base sts made do not row 40 ch1 single_crochet in the next 6 sts break yarn move to tail instructions decrease 4 times join with slip_stitch and turn below 28 single_crochet tail row 41 42 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join with slip_stitch and turn 28 single_crochet row 1 chain 8 slip_stitch in the 2nd chain from the hook work half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts double_crochet in row 43 ch1 single_crochet in the next 5 sts the next 2 sts treble_crochet in the next 2 sts then decrease 4 times join with slip_stitch and turn in the base sts work double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet 24 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch loosely in next 3 sts row 44 45 ch1 single_crochet evenly across join with slip_stitch and turn 24 single_crochet row 2 now at the opposite side of the base chain 8 slip_stitch in the 2nd chain from the row 46 ch1 single_crochet in the next 4 sts hook work half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts double_crochet in decrease 4 times join with slip_stitch and turn the next 2
